text: Hey everyone, Unreal Engine 5.7 is here
and brings you a ton of exciting
features.
Create bigger open worlds with the
procedural content generation framework.
Now production ready, PCG delivers
faster GPU performance and a new PCG
editor mode packed with a library of
tools you can easily use and customize.
The new procedural vegetation editor
lets you easily modify vegetation right
in the editor. Just grab one of the new
Quixle Mega Plants from Fab and make it
your own. Explore new tools to render
richer materials, denser worlds, and
immersive lighting.
The new Nanite Foliage system renders
vegetation smoothly in amazing detail at
massive scale. Substrate materials is
now production ready, making it easier
to create complex, highfidelity
materials with true physical accuracy.
And Mega Lights now delivers cleaner,
faster, more scalable dynamic lighting
workflows.
Accelerate animation with more in editor
functionality. With the new selection
sets, you can create complex selections
with a single click and easily share rig
controls across teams. You can also now
sculpt blend shapes, paint weights, and
place bones, all directly in the
skeletal editor. And the IK retargeter
delivers new operators for greater
creative control with support for
physics to help prevent self collisions.
Plus, with physics world collisions,
characters now interact naturally with
their surroundings. And get ready to
create more with metahumans. You can now
capture real-time facial animation with
an external camera with Live Link on
supported Android devices or iPads
with the updated Houdini plugin. Quickly
block out and refine hairstyles with no
grooming experience required.
Plus, gain full creative control over
hair movement in Unreal Engine with a
performant and intuitive joint-based
workflow.
And there's more. Virtual production
just got faster. The new dynamic
constraint component makes mocap
retargeting effortless with props that
attach naturally to characters and live
link broadcast turns Unreal into a live
animation source streaming data in real
time across your network. Finally, meet
your new AI assistant, ready to answer
your questions and guide you in real
time right in the editor. That's just a
glimpse of what's new in 5.7. Check out
the full release and download it now on
our website.
